thread.title: Preps roundup:Ellsworth leads ’Frog golfers over Linden
thread.title_full: Preps roundup:Ellsworth leads ’Frog golfers over Linden

title: Preps roundup:Ellsworth leads ’Frog golfers over Linden
text: Preps roundup:Ellsworth leads Frog golfers over Linden Preps roundup:Ellsworth leads Frog golfers over Linden By The Union Democrat Sports Department October 06, 2015 09:58 pm Hannah Ellsworth shot a 4-over par 40 Tuesday to lead the Bret Harte Bullfrogs girls’ golf team over the Linden Lions 200-230 at Greenhorn Creek Resort. Ellsworth bested the next best score by seven strokes to earn medalist honors. Also for Bret Harte (6-3 Valley Foothill League), Nicole Ayala shot a 49, Elizabeth Kristoff a 54 and Kellie Krpan a 57. Helene Dondero lead Linden with a 47. Ripon continues to pace the VFL with a 10-0 record. Sonora is 7-2 and the Bullfrogs are in third with three matches left before the end of season tournament. Bret Harte will take on Ripon Thursday at Jack Tone Golf Course. Bret Harte soccer beats Sonora 2-1 The Bret Harte Bullfrogs boys’ soccer team defeated the Sonora Wildcats 2-1 Thursday at Dunlavy Field. The Bullfrogs scored an early goal and took a 1-0 lead into halftime. Sonora’s Clayton Roberson tied the game with about 15 minutes left, but the Bullfrogs answered with the game winner in the final five minutes. “We had three or four one-on-one chances in the first half and couldn’t convert any of them,” said Wildcat head coach Lloyd Longeway. “We were off all night and didn’t finish our chances.” JV— The Bullfrogs won 3-1. CJ Parker scored the Wildcats goal. Follow UnionDemocrat.com
